short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Is that listing rent stabilized? Find out with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing GreenLight – your ultimate guide to finding possibly rent-stabilized gems on StreetEasy! With our sleek Chrome plugin, every possibly rent-stabilized listing gets a vibrant green icon, making them effortlessly stand out in your search. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to instant recognition. 

Whether you're a seasoned New Yorker or a newcomer to the city, GreenLight empowers you to spot the best deals with just a glance. Unlock the secret to affordable living and transform your apartment hunt with GreenLight – where stability meets visibility!
